document.full_text: pete, a popular, semi-tame moose who lives on a vermont elk-hunting farm, was spared a death sentence but will need to find a new home under state wildlife regulations signed into law on tuesday
document.title: new vermont wildlife law spares beloved pete the moose
lines_and_colors: pete, a popular, semi-tame moose who lives on a vermont elk-hunting farm, was spared a death sentence but will need to find a new home under state wildlife regulations signed into law on tuesday
